content: cat beanie quick and easy crochet pattern keep in mind there are countless patterns for cat beanies everywhere that come down to crocheting a simple rectangle and sewing it shut leaving one wide opening at the bottom i freehanded this one but it s so simple that there is a chance someone came up with something similar before i did so as well materials hook size = 5mm yarn needle yarn recommendation weight 2 double stranded e g yarnart baby petalouda standard etc about 220m or 240yds total 110m or 120yds each strand or weight 4-5 single stranded e g kartopu melange wool kartopu alpaca polo etc about 100m or 110yds size of the finished beanie laying flat 28cm wide x 18cm long 11 wide x 7 long abbreviations chain - chain st/sts - stitch/stitches double_crochet - double_crochet stsc - stacked single_crochet decrease - double_crochet 2 together decrease notes this pattern uses the american crochet terminology turn without chaining start each row with either ch3 or stsc both would count as a double_crochet you can adjust the base chain length to fit you better the panel should snugly fit around your head without being too tight pattern instructions base = ch61 10 row of double_crochet across 60 row 11 - stsc decrease double_crochet across until there are 3 sts left decrease double_crochet 58 row 12 - stsc double_crochet decrease double_crochet across until there are 4 stitches left decrease dc2 56 turn your work 90 degrees slip_stitch the sides together and the top of the panel where the base chain is to form a rectangle beanie fasten o� and weave in the ends on the wrong side of the beanie tadaa your cat beanie is complete any questions comments concerns feel free to contact me kami crochet
